title: Hearmorter Evoline v2 (Natura/Toxic) by Dremnderr on DeviantArt
cleaned_text: (Tip jar) A tip jar for people that wanna give me a lil help for my work. I really love to draw, but it doesn't always pay well. At least this little help will motivate me to continue with my artistic projects! 681 Views Description Spanish - English _______________________________ Esta es la primera linea evolutiva que escogi de mis sketches: Lo Completare luego Su rango se divide en los siguientes : Novato Aprendiz Especialista Experto (Secreto) Sus nombres temporales son: Afflee Heaf Hearm Hearmorter (Secreto) Los requisitos para corazon a todas las personas que me siguen y me motivan a continuar haciendo estos trabajos mios que como en un principio dije, disfruto mucho de hacerlo _______________________________________________________________ This is the first evolutionary line that I chose from my sketches: As you see this is quite incomplete i will fix that later Its the following : rookie Hearm to all the people who follow me and motivate me to continue doing these works of mine, as I said at first, I very much enjoy doing it () Dont worry ... Be happy !!!!! _______________________________ Esta es la primera linea evolutiva que escogi de mis sketches: [neoashuron.deviantart.com/art/...](https://neoashuron.deviantart.com/art/SKETCH-Natura-Ideas-Season-I-1-2-663435438) [neoashuron.deviantart.com/art/...](https://neoashuron.deviantart.com/art/SKETCH-Natura-Ideas-Season-I-2-2-663548023) Lo Completare luego Su rango se divide en los siguientes : Novato Aprendiz Especialista Experto (Secreto) Sus nombres temporales son: Afflee Heaf Hearm Hearmorter (Secreto) Los requisitos para corazon a todas las personas que me siguen y me motivan a continuar haciendo estos trabajos mios que como en un principio dije, disfruto mucho de hacerlo _______________________________________________________________ This is the first evolutionary line that I chose from my sketches: [neoashuron.deviantart.com/art/...](https://neoashuron.deviantart.com/art/SKETCH-Natura-Ideas-Season-I-1-2-663435438) [neoashuron.deviantart.com/art/...](https://neoashuron.deviantart.com/art/SKETCH-Natura-Ideas-Season-I-2-2-663548023) As you see this quite will fix that later Its the following : rookie Hearm to all the people who follow me and motivate me to continue doing these works of mine, as I said at first, I very much enjoy doing it () to add your comment.
